title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.2 - Equipment weighed with jockey
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4225.2 - Equipment weighed with jockey

State Regulations

If a horse runs in muzzle, martingale, breastplate or
clothing, it must be put on the scale and included in the jockey's
weight. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4225.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
